name: DuckDuckGo - Dark Grey (super simple)
description:
DuckDuckGo's dark theme is almost perfect. Only problem is a flash of white, and depending on how long it takes to load the page, can blind you when you're on a long searching stint.

This theme simply colors those parts that flash white, the rest of the DuckDuckGo theme really is good.

I've kept the coloring in the grey tones to match the already grey-toned DuckDuckGo theme(s).

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2016/07/05 - first release
2016/07/31 - either i missed the searchbox flashing white, or something changed... fixed it!
